name: Warrior
description: Strong, brutal, and always ready for a fight.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: You may discard up to 3 cards in combat. Each gives +1 Strength.

name: Mage
description: Master of spells and magic tricks.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: You may discard up to 3 cards after rolling to Run Away. Each gives +1.

abilities.name: Charm Spell
abilities.description: Discard your whole hand (min. 3 cards) to charm one monster. You get its Treasure but no levels.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Discard a card to give another player -2 Strength in combat.

abilities.name: Theft
abilities.description: Discard a card and roll a die. 4+ – theft successful, 3 or less – lose a level.

name: Cleric
description: Priest of light and defender of souls.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: You may draw face-up cards from the discard pile. For each, you must discard a card from your hand.

abilities.name: Turning
abilities.description: Discard up to 3 cards in combat against Undead. Each gives +3.

abilities.name: Big Items
abilities.description: You can carry any number of Big items.

abilities.name: 6 cards at end of turn
abilities.description: You can have 6 cards in your hand at the end of your turn.

abilities.name: Double Sell
abilities.description: Once per turn, you may sell one item for double value.

abilities.name: Second Chance
abilities.description: After a failed Run Away roll, you may discard a card to try again.

abilities.name: Level for Helping
abilities.description: You gain a level for every monster you help defeat.
